Stat calculation when combining
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Stat calculation when combining
By marhawkman on Sunday, November 14, 2010 - 12:57 pm:

Being a nerd I decided to calculate the stats I'd get from combining monsters.

star compatibility seems to use:
[base stats of result] + (([parent 1] + [parent 2])/2 * .32)

It's not exact. I'm not sure why but it varies a bit. This calculation is almost exact, but it gives stats that are a bit low. 2-4 points low out of 300+...

By marhawkman on Sunday, November 14, 2010 - 03:40 pm:

Oh and a compatibility of triangle has .095 instead of .32 for the calculation. :/

I wish I knew how the game actually calculates this the formula almost works, but I think I'm approximating the results of the way it's calculated instead of duplicating the calculation.

By Desdenova on Tuesday, April 26, 2011 - 11:43 pm:

Hmmm. I'm actually looking into this now and you're not too far off. If you've found new data let me know.
